item.title: After 2015 Fantastic Four Movie Star Kate Maraâ€™s Recent Comments About An MCU Return, I Need Marvel To Bring Her Sue Storm Back
item.description: Kate Mara worked hard to bring the role of Sue Storm to life in Fantastic Four, and she has made it clear how she feels about returning to the role.

item.title: Thunderbolts* Director Addresses What The Asterisk Means While Florence Pugh Reveals She Actually Knows
item.description: As the mystery of the Thunderbolts* asterisk continues to stoke speculation, Florence Pugh and the movie's director directly address it.

item.title: I Can't Believe How Mr. Peanut Just Made His Movie Debut After 109 Years
item.description: Mr. Peanut is known to be an iconic mascot and advertising logo, but surprisingly, after all these years, he has also finally made his movie debut.
